sentences.sContent: It was with some trepidation that I viewed the prospect of cycling across Uganda.
sentences.sCn: 想到要骑自行车穿越乌干达，我感到有点惊恐不安。

remMethod.val: trep (害怕) + id + ation → 怕得发抖 → 颤抖

trans.tranCn: 颤抖， 惊恐， 恐惧
trans.tranOther: Trepidation is fear or anxiety about something that you are going to do or experience
